reviews.review: What type of person keeps candy floss in their desk? Mentalists the lot of them.
wow...

Это лучшая игра, в которую я когда либо играл. В ней все великолепно, нет абсолютно никаких минусов, и команде разработчиков во главе с Кеном Левином хочется рукоплескать. Особенно шикарна концовка, пожалуй, лучшая в истории видеоигр. На мой взгляд, главный претендент на звание "Игры Года"
An amazing game with a very engaging story and challenging gameplay.

Если в шутерах вы  привыкли пролистывать сценки и не забивать голову ничем, кроме пыщь-пыщь, то играть в этот Биошок не стоит, несмотря на соотвествующий жанр и высокие оценки. Вся суть-в невероятной истории, ее точно стоит узнать. В будете собирать по крупицам информацию, строить предположения и  догадки, а потом, уже в самом конце, все равно есть большой шанс сразу не понять, весь шик составленной разработчиками паутины сюжета. Отдельный респект за полное слияние играющего с героем, которого часто нет и в именитых РПГ-в кои-то веки игрок знает о происходящем именно столько, сколько и ГГ.
This game.... can you dig it?
Beautiful.  Convoluted.  Ultimately Depressing.
Make many good choices for a good ending. Play on and realize they mean nothing.
Fantastisch , wie alle Bioshock Teile .
THIS IS THE GREATEST GAME I HAVE EVER PLAYED IN MY ENTIRE LIFE! GET IT NOW!

This is a story-telling masterpiece.  Following in the footsteps of Bioshock, this game delivers one whopper of a tale, one that will keep you riveted from beginning to end.  The game is certainly fun, but if you aren't playing it for the story, you're missing what truly makes it great.

A must for anyone who enjoyed the previous two games. Irrational Games' sense of atmosphere and artistic ingenuity are second to none. It has one of the most memorable stories you're likely to experiance all year. Elizabeth's abilities and the sky-hook (along with all the vigors) make for one of the most visceral and frenetic combat experiences I've experianced in a while. I also absolutely love the soundtrack; both the original score and the re-recorded rock and pop songs are amazing! My score is 9.5/10.

Good game and the only ____shock I've beaten.
Snape kills Dumbledore page 606.
***Spoiler Alert***

Deserves the hype. Altho its not so much an achievement of gameplay but more of setting and story. Sure the shooting of dudes is good enough, all the weapons have great design and are fun to use (even the usually dinky starter pistol is satisfyingly murderours) and you get to zap shit and such as in every Bioshock and the battles the game sets up are all good stuff but the main draw is the well crafted world and the dense atmosphere. From that follows i never felt like my time was wasted with filler shit (despite some minor backtracking) since theres always something cool to gawk at. The ~20 hours it took me is already good time for an FPS but these where some packed hours to boot. Warning tho, regarding the extent of free-roaming exploration its about the same as BS2 (ergo not that very much - this aint no Dishonored) but think about your most favorite movie and then about how much it bothered you that it was linear :P

Having played both BioShock 1 and 2, I've been waiting for this game since it was announced. While the actual game doesn't have all the story elements that we saw in the trailers, the game is still a perfect addition to the BioShock franchise, and it more than lives up to all the hype. And even though the actual storyline only gives you maybe 20 hours or gameplay, the fact that the devlopers left the game open for future DLCs is a serious bonus in my mind, and the fact that buying the Season Pass gives you some immediate in-game bonuses, all of which are VERY helpful to the player, is a great feature, making it well worth the extra $20 that it costs.

Now let's also get something straight right off the bat. This game is *not* BioShock 1 or 2. Some of the elements present are out of sorts with the rest of the game; searching through trashcans still nets you stuff, but ubnlike BioShock, there isn't a real point to it, story-wise. Same goes for Vigors. Yes, it would seem odd to have a BioShock without Plasmids or something like them, but aside from a small handfull of enemies, only Booker seems to use them. So there are issues, but the overall story is so complex and deep that if you take the time to look around, pick up the recordings, notice the little things (all be it amidst the carnage wrought by Booker) you'll see just how well crafted a world is being presented here, within a story that has implications not just for Columbia but for all possible BioShock games, both past and future.
Metacritic rating says it all
Loved every minute of it.
Meiner Meinung nach eindeutiger Anwärter für das GotY.

Visually Stunning!
Engaging Gameplay!
Best of the Bioshock Series!
So Much Fun!
Requires 20GB of Disk Space!
play this shit.

Ken Levine and his team do it again! The fascinating mind-tingling plot will create a gravitational field on your chair. At least until you've played through one of the best video game experiences of all time.
Mind Blowing. Just mind blowing.
Play this game. Best game ever made. Does not disappoint. PLAY IT!!!

Gehört zu den besten Storys die ich je gespielt habe. Atemberaubend und voller überaschender Wendungen. Das Setting ist hervoragend. Elizabeth ist traumhaft und man ertappt sich des öfteren ihr ein "Danke" zuzurufen, wenn sie einem im letzten Moment das rettende Munitionspack zuwirft. Es ist schade, das auch diese Story irgendwann logischerweise enden muss. Ich hätte mir noch eine Nvidia 3D Unterstützung gewünscht. Der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist angemessen. Aber das ist jammern auf hohem Niveau. Es ist eine Perle und den Spielen und jeder sollte den Titel gespielt haben.

As bittersweet as this game is for me to review, knowing all that it was built up to be compared to what it ended up as. I cannot deny that it is a wonderful experience, with well crafted characters (those given time to grow at least) gun-play that is amazing. Great sounds, models, flow, feel. I guess the one exception being explosives which always feel like they're barely scratching some enemies.

Its hard to recommend this game to someone, as a single-player story game. As going into the story, especially of this game. Risks spoiling the story. Which in turn would make the whole game a lot more underwhelming. 

The base game is great. But do yourself a favor and avoid the DLCs like the plague.

Where to begin?

Never have I played a game that had such a strong sense of place.  Never has a game made me ponder more.  Never has a game made me think so much about it, for good or ill.  This game invades dreams and dominates discussions.  This game unites and divides fans.

Is it perfect?  No.  Far from it.  But even in its flaws there is scope for debate and disection.  The ludicrous gore juxtaposed against high concept storytelling.  Narrative handwaving clashing with intensely personal characterization.  Figuring out just exactly what's going on, how much of it is real and coming to conclusions on what the whole damn thing is actually about can be migraine inducing.

But if you can play shooters and you don't mind gore you must play this game.  Not should. Must.  It's one of those rare beasts like Journey that makes me question how humans, mere mortals, could put something this spectacular together.

Breathtaking is a word too often used, but I'm not being hyperbolic here.  I literally gasped and held my breath at some of the artistry, concepts and moments in this game.  And again, like Journey, it's one of the rare games that has brought me to the edge of tears.

I ache to spoil all of this game, pick apart every nuance and nitpick every flaw, but I won't.  I'll just leave it to you, whmever is reading this, to discover it all for yourself.

Go buy this game...would you kindly?

Absolutely stunning - sure it's not got the greatest combat mechanics, some of the plot twists are a bit of a stretch and some of the mechanics aren't as good as the original BioShock BUT this is possibly one of the most beautiful and well realised worlds I've ever experienced in a game.  Yes a lot of reviewers stuck on their "OHMAHGAWD B-E-A-Utiful" glasses and overlooked some of the flaws but it still deserves the 90%+ scores.  You probably owe it to yourself to experience it.
If you don't eat everything in sight, you're playing it wrong.

Ооох..пройдя игру и получил массу впечатлений от игры,особено от Элизабет,от того как она себя вела,её мимика лица :грустная,весёлая,сердитая,порой агрессивная.Впечатлил и сюжет игры,что можно в любой момент изменить изменить любую ситуацию,открыв тока разрыв,механика игры на высоте,мир игры просто прекрасен и т.д можно очень много перечислять..и так хотелось чтобы эта игра не кончалась,чтоб всегда было продолжение..
Моя оценка : 10/10
A work of art
"There's always a man, a lighthouse, and a city."
È sicuramente a livello del primo, con un gameplay vagamente più tattico.

I really would recommend this game to ANYONE. The storyline....Fantastic, The graphics....Stunning. I really did not like the first two bioshock games but this one blew me away and makes me want to play the first two again!
Play this game.

Whoa.

I was not expecting such a fantastic game.  The storyline left me confused on the first run through, but playthrough after playthrough, I was able to put more and more in place.  This game hits on social taboos like race and religion; something more games won't go near.  Combat is exciting and fun (especially when riding the skylines!)  Irrational should be very proud of themselves.  ** 92/100 **
Horrible gameplay, but the story makes it worth it.
Get it, then play on Hard on your first playthrough. Great experience.
9/10! Goodie goodie!
Fantastiskt spel rakt igenom! Speciellt slutet var extra fantastiskt. ÄLSKADE DET!

Bombastischer Nachfolger der beiden vorrangegangenen Teile. Sehr gut ausgearbeitete Story, durchdachte charakteristische Eigenschaften der Hauptpersonen und wundervolle Gegenden machen dieses Spiel zurecht zu einem der Anwärter auf das Game of the Year 2013. Selbst nach einmaligem Durchspielen wird BioShock Infinite nicht langweilig, da man auf den 1999-Mode zurückgreifen kann. Sehr empfehlenswert!

All i can say is......... w0w! its an amazing game. I don't know why i haven't played the first 2 games?! Deserves the title for GOTY 2013 hands down. The story and the interaction between the characters really brought the game to life. It felt like watching a really good movie throughout my entire playtime. My only regret is that i didn't buy a hardcopy. It definitely   earned a spot in my game collection. WORTH $60 no doubt! I'll probably play again on hard with 1999 mode and see what that's about. Try it out for yourselves :) HIGHLY RECOMMENDED GAME.
Brilliant story telling wrapped in a beautiful game, worthy successor to the series.

I have just completed the game and God damn it's good, it has an exellent story, great art-style and a phenomenal world to explore. this is truly a game that every gamer should experience. I personally loved the game from beginning to end, and Elizabeth oh god I think I'v fallen in love with her...
Probably the best game I've played in years.  Runs well on a variety of hardware...looks amazing...and has a great story.  A must have!
shut up and take my money

게임을 시작하자 마자 게임 오프닝과 브금들은 당신을 환상속으로 빠뜨릴 것입니다 
고급 언리얼 그래픽 엔진과 탄탄한 스토리 들은 당신을 아름다운 세계로 빠드릴 것입니다 

주인공 '부커' 가 되어 앨리자베스와 환상적인 모험을 떠나보세요 !
The most breath-taking game I have played in many years...

Probably one of the best games of our generation. Absolutely aesthetic and orgasmic experience. The characters, story-telling and the setting along with presentation stand out. You will fall in love with Columbia and specially Elizabeth. Worth every penny.

Bioshock Infinite delivers on the promise of its predecessor. No, I don't mean Bioshock 2, and go wash your mouth out for suggesting it. The Zero Punctuation review pretty much hits the nail on the head, but I'll say for me it was absolutely worth playing, and Irrational has made Elizabeth the best supporting character since GLaDOS. I mean,  an escort who doesn't constantly die? Supplies you with ammo, health, and magic when you need it, but not so often it detracts from play? Sold. Two thumbs up.
Un des meilleurs jeux qu'il m'est etait donné de jouer.
Шедевр.
Single player is a delight.  Story is awesome.  Main characters Dewitt, Elizabeth, Comstock, are truly amazing.  Ending is a total mind f*ck!  I played it twice to get most of the ending.
Easily GOTY.  Amazing.
There really arent enough words to describe the awesomeness of this game.
best....game....ever
5/5, Far Better Than F*cking Amazing, Dont Buy Food For A Few Days And Buy This!!

Jogo fantástico, um enredo muito interessante, jogabilidade precisa e descomplicada, fluída. Gráficos impressionantes, mesmo em configurações baixas. Uma experiência de jogo indescritível, dá até gosto de jogar. Recomendo.

I don't recommend this game but that's not gonna stop you from buying and playing it. The campaign is basically on rails (lel), compared to the open explorable areas of Bioshock and System Shock. Skyrails don't do shit, they just make it harder to hit enemies, unless your playing on hard or lower (like some sort of casual), which they then become the vehicle for instakills. There are literally 4 different enemies (footy, spliced footy, Turrets, Patriot) that you fight for 9 HOURS STRAIGHT. The two bosses are fucking retarded. The Ghost literally cheats. It leaves no openings for the player to attack, in addition to constantly resureccting the dead with no limits. Its basically attrition. The game devs saw how broken one encounter was so they put a vending machine in the corner just so it would be fair. The fight then turns into you constantly buying health and ammo, the only source of supplies in the entire encouner, while the ghost beats the shit out of you until you finally win. Handymen are butt-frustrating because they take so many hits, and can kill you in one hit, but are basically turned into retarded bullet sponges if you are lucky enough to get the invincibilty gear early on (this gear is literally game breaking). It basically plays like a 12 hour Call of Duty with better graphics. None of the inventiveness of Bioshock is found in this game. 

Story was pretty good though.
This was a pretty excellent game. It wasn't as creepy as the original, but it had its own vibe. Definately had its share of weird twists. Buy it.

One of the few masterpiece games ever released with some solid gameplay, but mostly, what really makes this game stand aside from others it’s the story; it has to be one of the best and most captive stories that you’ll ever find in a game and it’s so rich and deep that you’ll forget you’re actually playing one.

Wow, absolutely epic story line that has to have been one of the best in any game i have played for a long time   Just if you can overlook a few minor gameplay issues, one of the best games of recent years and almost perfect, almost. Still amazing and well worth buying!

I highly recommend this game for anyone looking for a real challenge when it comes to shooters. 1999 Mode is no joke and is only for the best of the best. Not to mention this game has one of the most intelligently, intricately written stories I have ever experienced. Top it off with being a real looker, this game manages to blow the first Bioshock out of the water (no pun intended) haha.
Best Story 2013 so far. A great Game in any case. But somehow the fights are less fun than in Bioshock 1

Honestly it really wasn't that great. Problems such as why we get to use several vigors while enemies only use a couple of powers against you, boss that just sponged damage as "mini" bosses. The later half of the game goes down hill as the story just speeds up and for me felt rather place. Without spoiling anything the whole infinite plot feels rather wasted and never lived up to anything. 

Overall a bunch of meh mobs and some poorly designed bosses, a dull plot realistically if your familiar with the infinite portion of the story and such a linear experience makes this game overall "not good". Sure as hell wasn't woth full price.

Precioso de comienzo a fin, historia muy currada y un final impresionante.
Para mi, uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado, candidato a juego no del año, del siglo!

Ahí queda eso

Seriously why haven't you bought this game already?

BioShock Infinite полноправно может называться Произведением Искусства.
Без коментариев. 10 из 10

Купил из-за рекомендаций,ни разу не пожалел.Потрясающая атмосфера,сюжет музыка.Непередоваемые ощущения.Оценка: 10/10.

Immersive combat and storytelling make this one of the best games I've ever played.  I can't recommend it enough.
Awesome game with awesome ending.
Game gud. Shoot things. Things die. Story be gud too. Favourite game. 11/10 would play again.

В общем и целом игра на крепкую четверку. Слегка разочарован, т.к. ждал большего. Есть ряд вещей, которые откровенно бесят, типа неотключаемых туториалов (даже в режиме 1999) и непрокручиваемых длительных катсцен. Откровенно порадовал только вражеский ИИ, лучше в шутерах не видел (не считая застревания крупных врагов в текстурах, конечно).
Worth it.

Hands down one of the best games I've ever played, and it really does battle for first if not the best in my book. Note to fans of classic B1 gameplay: As they may a bit disappointed with a lot of gameplay changes. Core gameplay (while still remaining) has changed a lot and taken on different "colors" in a matter of speaking.

There is much to be had in both story and characters, (and if you aren't sore about gameplay changes) the gameplay offers a good range of varried tactics, weapons/vigors and locations to keep it both interesting and entertaining.

The DLC offers a wide playing field of either more story campaign, or wave based arenas for the die hard shooter. It's both a thrill ride and a mind boggler, that I'd recommend to anyone. So go ahead, but be prepared for taking the epic road of awesomness!

This is a great game. Not perfect but certainly one of the best games since HL2. Been so busy playing I forgot to recommend it! The heart of this story is the relationship between the two main characters Booker and Elizabeth. This is unlike BioShock were it was about the City of Rapture. It is a much more personal story. A story of regret about the choices you have made and how they change you. It is also about how a differant choice could be much worse than the one you made and that at times what choice you make does not really change anything. There is a lot of mind bending things going on with quantum physics and the like which can be a bit hard to understand at times. But if you pay attention it is all explained though it might take a little thinking to put it together. sm
Ever wanted to question your entire existance? Wanted to feel like your metaphysical brain has just been gangbanged by a group of psychologists? Play Bioshock Infinite. Incredible. 11/10
Uns dos melhores jogos que já joguei na vida!

One of the best games I've played in years. Gripping, intelligent story, beautiful graphics, and fun gameplay that doesn't feel like you're doing the same thing over and over again like some FPSs. The music is amazing as well and beautifully pulls you into the world of Bioshock: Infinite.
Шедевр, который нельзя пропустить.
Le jeu est epoustouflant et bien optimisé pour les configs entre moyenne et haut de gamme!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PIb6AZdTr-A

This game is absolutely phenomenal. The environments and characters are beautiful, the music (like Bioshock 1) is an absolute treat to listen to, and combat is fun.
There are a few Vigors and Gear pieces which you end up using 95% of the time, and a few others that the other 5% of the time will make you practically unkillable, but the variety presented to the player to suit their playstyle is more than adequate.

This game is best played if you've finished Bioshock 1, but as a stand-alone game Bioshock Infinite is still absolutely superb. Definitely worth every penny.

Uma das melhores histórias que tive o prazer de acompanhar, e não precisou de cutscenes de 5 em 5 minutos para contá-la. Jogo do ano. 

5/5
An intellectual and philosophical adventure in the steampunk world of BioShock, one of godly porportions in which the cinematic feel is almost pristine.

I never had a taste for the first 2 Bioshock games but something still compelled me to pick this one up. That decision could turn out to be the best gaming related decision that I will make all year as this game is outstanding. I found myself actually caring for Elizabeth and that's something that is hard for me to do: care for a digital character. The setting is vast and deep. The characters are interesting. The story is thought provoking  and the visuals are stunning. Oh, and the music isn't bad either. Buy now.

Wahrscheinlich das beste Spiel 2013!
Großartiges Setting, gelungenes Gameplay und eine Story, die niemanden kalt lassen dürfte.
If you like to fight a ridiculous number of enemies and don't like 'Merica this game is for you!
Bring us the girl and wipe away the debt.
This game be tight
What are you doing? Drop it and play this game. Play it on HARD too.

Sehen Sie auch genau zu? - So heißt es in dem Film "Prestige", welchen ich immer sehr gemocht habe.
Dieses Spiel ist dem Film sehr ähnlich, da das Ende einen erstmal sehr verwirrt doch beim zweiten Spielen fällt einem sehr schnell auf wieviel doch schon angedeutet wurde. Bioshock 1 war für mich ein Meilenstein meiner Computerspielzeit. Die Atmosphäre und die Story des Spieles waren für mich nahezu unbeschreiblich gut.

Ich hätte nie gedachz, dass Bioshock 3 dies nochmal schafft.

Zugegeben: Der Gamscomtrailer aus 2010 sah meiner Meinung nach, nach einem besseren Spiel aus (Düster und Verrückt wie Rapture), doch dieses Spiel ist auch mit seiner intakten Stadt sehr verzaubernd.

50Euro sind in diesem Fall gerechtfertigt! Das sehe ich selten ein zu zahlen.

Meine persönliche Bewertung:

Atmosphäre 8/10
(Sehr viel Liebe zum Detail und gute deutsche Synchronisation)
KI 8/10
(Gegner KI etwas eintönig, aber Elizabeth ist ein großartiger niemals störender Mitspieler)
Story 10/10
(Ich denke seit 1,5 Wochen über das Ende nach. Reiht sich locker in Spiele wie Bioshock 1 / Mafia 1 / Fahrenheit / Max Payne 1&2 und Portal 2 ein)
Gameplay 6/10
(Eigentlich hielt mich nur Elizabeth und ihre Geschichte am Spielen und die liebevolle Welt. Die Kämpfe waren leicht und fast schon störend. Was die Kämpfe anging bin ich nie wirklich mit dem Spiel warm geworden)
Soundtrack 9/10
(Sehr stimmige Musik. Ich wüsste nicht wie es besser ginge. Für 10/10 müsste schon mein Musikgeschmack umgekrempelt werden wie damals bei Donkey Kong Country 2)

Gesamt 41/50 (82%)
Awful piece of shit, don't you dare to buy it. I regret giving money to these assholes who think that a consolized turd with an overdone plot twist is a decent game.
